title: Repo sync

details: Added new concepts page for MCP management explaining registries, policies, and IDE support.
Replaced monolithic MCP configuration guide with two focused guides: registry setup and access policies.
Created new "Manage MCP usage" section in admin how-tos.

Updated navigation indexes to reflect new structure.
